data.description_html:
This spell summons an Elysian thrush (see page 118), a birdlike creature native to the Blessed Fields of Elysium.
The creature has no significant combat utility, but its song accelerates the natural healing rate of living creatures.
Those within 30 feet who listen to the thrush's song while resting recover at twice the normal natural healing rate.
data.name: Summon Elysian Thrush
